lw-chart

A lightweight chart implemented by canvas

Get Started →

Lightweight

Implement chart drawing by Canvas

Configurable

Each item of the chart is configurable

Extendibility

Based on class inheritance, it can be extended flexibly to meet different needs

# Install

yarn add lw-chart # or: npm install lw-chart
1
